channel.title: Custom weopon wielding glitch
channel.description: Ok I just downloaded the dragon war scimitar in the models sections and I converted them to .dat files and gzipped them. I made sure there also was a drop and wield file and one was right hand animation and the other no anime because it was the drop model. When I added the item in class8 of my client and added the models in game and to item.cfg and to a store everything appears correct until I wield it. When I wield it the blade points from the middle of my chest backward and I walk with the sword sticking outside of my back. Anyone know how to fix it?

item.title: Custom weopon wielding glitch
item.dc:creator: @dogzound5 dogzound5@gmail.com
item.description:
@dogzound5 wrote:

It will work without converting it to .dat??

Read full topic

item.title: Custom weopon wielding glitch
item.dc:creator: @N0vlafe N0vlafe
item.description:
@N0vlafe wrote:

don’t add animation, when i add custom item all i do is extract the file to my destop and gzip it i don’t convert to .dat, i add to my model folder, than i add the int to class8.java and i compile than i go into my server and log in and type add model [model number] do for drop file and wear, than exit ur client compile and run and kablam

Read full topic
